title: A.A. WILLIAMS Streams Full Audiotree Live Session, Announces European Tour
description: Happening in early 2026. The post A.A. WILLIAMS Streams Full Audiotree Live Session, Announces European Tour appeared first on Metal Injection.
author: Greg Kennelty
byline: By Greg Kennelty Published 8 hours ago
text: A.A. Williams just announced a full European tour for 2026 that kicks off on January 29 at the Bodega venue in Nottingham, UK. Alongside that announcement comes a full stream of A.A. Williams' performance at Audiotree's studios recorded live on September 20, 2024 in Chicago, IL. Better yet, the performance comes with an interspersed interview with Audiotree Host Psalm One. So y'know – an overall pretty immersive experience. Check that out above and make sure to catch A.A. Williams at one of their many 2026 tour dates below. 1/29 Nottingham, UK Bodega1/30 Manchester, UK Deaf Institute1/31 Glasgow, UK G22/1 Leeds, UK Brudenell Social Club2/3 Birmingham, UK Hare & Hounds2/4 Bristol, UK Strange Brew2/5 London, UK Bush Hall2/6 Southampton, UK Papillon2/7 Diksmuide, BE 4AD2/8 Paris, FR Nouveau Casino2/10 Toulouse, FR Le Rex2/11 Barcelona, ES La Nau2/12 Madrid, ES Villanos2/13 Lisbon, PT Musicbox2/14 Porto, PT Mouco2/15 Donosti, ES Dabadaba2/17 Grenoble, FR l'Ampérage2/18 Milan, IT Legend Club2/19 Aarau, CH KiFF2/20 Munich, DE Live / Evil2/21 Vienna, AT Chelsea2/22 Prague, CZ SUBZERO2/24 Warsaw, PL VooDoo2/25 Berlin, DE Neue Zukunft2/26 Cologne, DE Gebäude 92/27 Eindhoven, NL Effenaar2/28 Utrecht, NL Tivoli Cloud Nine3/7 Istanbul, TR Blind Want More Metal? html:
A.A. Williams just announced a full European tour for 2026 that kicks off on January 29 at the Bodega venue in Nottingham, UK. Alongside that announcement comes a full stream of A.A. Williams' performance at Audiotree's studios recorded live on September 20, 2024 in Chicago, IL. Better yet, the performance comes with an interspersed interview with Audiotree Host Psalm One. So y'know – an overall pretty immersive experience.

Check that out above and make sure to catch A.A. Williams at one of their many 2026 tour dates below.

1/29 Nottingham, UK Bodega
1/30 Manchester, UK Deaf Institute
1/31 Glasgow, UK G2
2/1 Leeds, UK Brudenell Social Club
2/3 Birmingham, UK Hare & Hounds
2/4 Bristol, UK Strange Brew
2/5 London, UK Bush Hall
2/6 Southampton, UK Papillon
2/7 Diksmuide, BE 4AD

3/7 Istanbul, TR Blind
